revised_title: Report of Kew Observatory Committee: Yearly Summary of Magnetic, Meteorological, and Seismological Observations
tldr: The Kew Observatory Committee reports on the various observations and experiments conducted throughout the year 1899, including magnetic, meteorological, and seismological observations. The report covers magnetic disturbances, meteorological data, electrograph usage, and seismograph activity, as well as providing details on the instruments used and their maintenance.
